title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.16 - Gas free certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.16 - Gas free certification

State Regulations

No watercraft last used for the bulk transportation of
inflammable liquids (having a flash point of 80 degrees Fahrenheit or lower, open cup test), or inflammable compressed gases, shall be berthed at a terminal
unless written permission has first been obtained from the
manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
